title: Average Hours of Work Per Week, Production Workers, Manufacturing, Total for United States
notes:
Series Is Presented Here As Two Variables--(1)--Original Data, 1920-1948 (2)--Original Data, 1932-1969. Beginning With 1959, Alaska And Hawaii Are Included. Source: Bureau Of Labor Statistics, Bulletins No. 1312, 1312-1 And Subsequent Bulletins

This NBER data series m08029b appears on the NBER website in Chapter 8 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter08.html.

NBER Indicator: m08029b
